meanings.definition: A fine-grained, dense rock formed by the alteration of basaltic lava flows.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a piece of spilite during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The spilite in the quarry showed signs of volcanic origin.
meanings.sent3: The spilite looked like a solidified river of lava.
meanings.sent4: The spilite walls of the cave seemed to hold ancient secrets.
meanings.sent5: The miners marveled at the intricate patterns in the spilite rock.

meanings.sent1: The volcanic activity can spilite the rocks over time.
meanings.sent2: She will spilite the basalt into a fine-grained rock.
meanings.sent3: The artist's hands seemed to spilite the clay effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: His words had the power to spilite the unity of the group.
meanings.sent5: The chef's skilled hands spilited the dough into perfect shapes.
